text:
Hello, I'm looking to add some DEAL attributes in my Quotes custom template.  Any clues on how to do it?
For a property with id "end_of_trial_date" I'm trying to display it with {{ DEAL_end_of_trial_date }}... without success. Any clue?

It looks like there is currently a bug with the HubDB row field module. If column choice I choose for ‘*Columns for choice label*’ is a `select` field in the HubDB table, the ‘*Default HubDB row*’, will only pull `[object Object]` arrays in, as opposed to the list of options in the select field. I tested it with several other previously published tables, and I get the same result each time.
